description: The Windows Gaming Workstation includes various utilities preinstalled for Game Developers. Built on top of Visual Studio 2019 Windows image, this particularly includes a game engine like Unreal or Unity, and Perforce. Nvidia drivers and DirectX are setup and have been optimized to enable remote development. Using the Windows Gaming Workstation Image, developers will able to quickly checkout their source control and assets to begin development without the need for any setup or configuration. This image will save developers nearly a dozen hours in initial setup time. Studios can also build their own custom images using this as a base. The AzureSDK for Playfab is also configured to enable easier deployment to the cloud.
